91044f83-841e-4e7d-8bac-c325a2cffbbc.name: 两种通常会在一起使用的武器

765be901-606c-4df0-bd4b-a7d55a972485.name: Dual Ready (@Left Hand Melee Skill@/@Right Hand Melee Skill@)

fdc82836-b1cb-4ea1-950b-b84729914389.name: Lethal Weapon
fdc82836-b1cb-4ea1-950b-b84729914389.notes: Add special modifier Improvised Weapons +20% to Weapon Master (Ninja Weapons)

6989e738-ad1b-4e76-b5aa-ac65940e62e2.name: 易于命中
6989e738-ad1b-4e76-b5aa-ac65940e62e2.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

0ccb1599-2177-488a-9e6a-89d197dbb5b1.name: 魅力
0ccb1599-2177-488a-9e6a-89d197dbb5b1.notes: Roll vs Will-4 to resist. Add Mind Shield.

b210ddf5-f050-410f-acdb-bd36a5a87f8a.name: Way of Tools
b210ddf5-f050-410f-acdb-bd36a5a87f8a.notes: Ninja can buy any number of Ninja Tools as long as they take the modifier and meet the prerequisites.

2139a6b9-2210-4947-9bf8-04a68a30fe30.name: 战斗反射
2139a6b9-2210-4947-9bf8-04a68a30fe30.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

02d728e2-9487-48f6-acff-3405bd558af7.name: 健康
02d728e2-9487-48f6-acff-3405bd558af7.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

b0f0a980-2a8c-4956-83b0-14e59ea26dea.name: Fit, Very
b0f0a980-2a8c-4956-83b0-14e59ea26dea.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

fd75a2d3-a01c-4f65-bfec-2d8435714106.name: 幸运
fd75a2d3-a01c-4f65-bfec-2d8435714106.notes: 游戏的每个小时可用一次

4188a4f5-4c11-4c3b-aeec-dcdfca5a6fa5.name: @罕见：加速度，高原反应，潜水病，晕船，或是太空病等@

404f13f8-473e-41a0-8c03-3f798f4d20f3.name: 标志性装备
404f13f8-473e-41a0-8c03-3f798f4d20f3.notes: 对于一般用钱买来的装备，例如武器与铠甲而言，每 1 点此优势给予这些装备最多等于模组中平均开始财富值 50% 的额外价值（但绝不会是现金）。

7be667bc-cd7f-4ef0-876b-c7cb47f65da4.name: Vow (Own no more than what can be carried)

516bf916-8614-4b4f-bcb3-2348e3a0c86a.name: 社会污名（少数群体）
516bf916-8614-4b4f-bcb3-2348e3a0c86a.notes: -2 Reaction from others; +2 Reaction in own group

db2339e1-a09b-4f16-b743-1544f5c19f22.name: Another 4 points apeice on two more of these melee weapon skills, each at -1 to skill

fe8507d7-fd5b-4a65-bb6d-2c001c238b35.name: Judo
fe8507d7-fd5b-4a65-bb6d-2c001c238b35.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。

c14c7628-c68a-46d0-a79b-9ea3f508ae38.name: 7 points spent on
c14c7628-c68a-46d0-a79b-9ea3f508ae38.notes: Or to improve primary, secondary, or special skills, or adding any additional weapon skills from those listed above
